item.description:
Buddy Night: Harvest Time

The Pilgrims are planing a grand feast after bringing in the harvest. But the Goblin King is scheming to steal the entire harvest for all the goblins to eat. The Pilgrims will have to put up a solid defense to prevent the goblins from stealing any of the harvest. Will it be the goblins or the Pilgrims to have the final turkey leg at the grand feast?

Pre Reg: $15/members and friends $25/nonmembers
At Door: $25/members and friends $35/nonmembers

Waiver Required for all non-members
Contact Us to Pre-Register
item.name: Buddy Night: Harvest Time
